title: Menu Modifier Selection
description: Flat modifier selection entry for a modifier group. Use parent_selection_id/path to model nested selections.

id.description: Selection identifier for linking nested modifier selections.

modifier_group_id.description: Modifier group identifier for this selection.

quantity.description: Selected quantity for this modifier item.

parent_selection_id.description: Immediate parent selection identifier that introduced this group (for nested groups).

parent_selection_path.description: Normalized path of ancestor selection identifiers from root to immediate parent.
